MyBio::Data::File::SAM Record
SummaryIncluded librariesPackage variablesSynopsisDescriptionGeneral documentationMethods
Summary
MyBio::Data::File::SAM::Record - Object representing a record of a sam file
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Inherit
MyBio::_Initializable
Synopsis
    # Object representing a record of a sam file 

    # To initialize 
    my $sam_record = MyBio::Data::File::SAM::Record->new({
        QNAME      => undef,
        FLAG       => undef,
        RNAME      => undef,
        POS        => undef,
        MAPQ       => undef,
        CIGAR      => undef,
        RNEXT      => undef,
        PNEXT      => undef,
        TLEN       => undef,
        SEQ        => undef,
        QUAL       => undef,
        TAGS       => undef,
        EXTRA_INFO => undef,
    });
Description
    This object represents a record of a sam file and offers methods for accessing the different attributes.
    It implements several additional methods that transform original attributes in more manageable attributes.
    eg. from the FLAG attribute the actual strand is extracted etc.

Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->set_qname($$data{QNAME}); # String [!-?A-~]f1,255g Query template NAME
	$self->set_flag($$data{FLAG});   # Int [0,216-1] bitwise FLAG
	$self->set_rname($$data{RNAME}); # String \*|[!-()+-<>-~][!-~]* Reference sequence NAME
	$self->set_pos($$data{POS});     # Int [0,229-1] 1-based leftmost mapping POSition
	$self->set_mapq($$data{MAPQ});   # Int [0,28-1] MAPping Quality
	$self->set_cigar($$data{CIGAR}); # String \*|([0-9]+[MIDNSHPX=])+ CIGAR string
	$self->set_rnext($$data{RNEXT}); # String \*|=|[!-()+-<>-~][!-~]* Ref. name of the mate/next segment
	$self->set_pnext($$data{PNEXT}); # Int [0,229-1] Position of the mate/next segment
	$self->set_tlen($$data{TLEN});   # Int [-229+1,229-1] observed Template LENgth
	$self->set_seq($$data{SEQ});     # String \*|[A-Za-z=.]+ segment SEQuence
	$self->set_qual($$data{QUAL});   # String [!-~]+ ASCII of Phred-scaled base QUALity+33
	$self->set_tags($$data{TAGS});   # Extra tags
}
get_alternative_mappingsdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_alternative_mappings {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	my $tag = 'XA:Z';
	my $value = $self->get_tag($tag);
	if (defined $value) {
		my @alternative_mappings = split(/;/,$value);
		return @alternative_mappings;
	}
}
get_cigardescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_cigar {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{CIGAR};
}
get_flagdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_flag {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{FLAG};
}
get_lengthdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_length {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_stop - $self->get_start + 1;
}

get_startdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_start {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_pos - 1;
}
get_stopdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_stop {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->get_start + length($self->get_seq) - 1 - $self->insertion_count;
}
get_stranddescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_strand {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->get_flag & 16) {
		return -1;
	}
	elsif ($self->is_mapped) {
		return 1;
	}
	else {
		return undef;
	}
}
get_strand_symboldescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_strand_symbol {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	my $strand = $self->get_strand;
	if ($strand == 1) {
		return '+';
	}
	elsif ($strand == -1) {
		return '-';
	}
	else {
		return undef;
	}
}
get_tagdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_tag {
	my ($self, $tag_id) = @_;
	
	if (defined $self->get_tags) {
		return $self->get_tags->{$tag_id};
	}
}
get_tagsdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_tags {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{TAGS};
}
get_tlendescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_tlen {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{TLEN};
}
insertion_countdescriptionprevnextTop
sub insertion_count {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	my $insertion_count = 0;
	my $cigar = $self->get_cigar;
	while ($cigar =~ /(\d)I/g) {
		$insertion_count += $1;
	}
	return $insertion_count;
}
is_mappeddescriptionprevnextTop
sub is_mapped {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->get_flag & 4) {
		return 0;
	}
	else {
		return 1;
	}
}
is_unmappeddescriptionprevnextTop
sub is_unmapped {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->get_flag & 4) {
		return 1;
	}
	else {
		return 0;
	}
}
set_cigardescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_cigar {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	$self->{CIGAR} = $value if defined $value;
}

set_tagsdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_tags {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	
	if (defined $value) {
		foreach my $tag_var (@$value) { #"XT:A:R\tNM:i:0\tX0:i:2\tX1:i:0\tXM:i:0\tXO:i:0\tXG:i:0\tMD:Z:32\tXA:Z:chr9,+110183777,32M,0;"
			my ($tag, $tag_type, $tag_value) = split(/:/,$tag_var);
			$self->{TAGS}->{"$tag:$tag_type"} = $tag_value;
		}
	}
}
set_tlendescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_tlen {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	$self->{TLEN} = $value if defined $value;
}
General documentation
EXAMPLESTop
    # Check if the record corresponds to a match
    my $mapped = $sam_record->is_mapped();
    
    # Check if the record corresponds to a non match
    my $unmapped = $sam_record->is_unmapped();
    
    # Parse the FLAG attribute and return 1 or -1 for the strand
    my $strand = $sam_record->get_strand();
